about_the_game:
STORY
I wandered into a Western-style house in the fog looking for my cat.
A world of unseen monsters roamed about, a world that seemed to be cut off from reality.
I must find the cat. My cat, pale and smelling of the moon.
In the midst of it all, I find stray cats that have escaped from the monsters.
I protect them and offer them a place to live.
Then I will fend off the enemy and exchange words with the mysterious inhabitants of the mansion.
This will surely lead me to the truth hidden in the mansion and the whereabouts of my cats.

About this game
This is a horror game about defeating monsters, protecting cats and making them happy.
In the mansion, you collect various materials to protect cats and advance the story.
At home, use the materials to make furniture to make the protected cat's living environment better.
Then, find the truth hidden in the depths of the mansion and your cat that ran away from home.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some scenes that suggest self-harm or suicide.

detailed_description:
STORY
I wandered into a Western-style house in the fog looking for my cat.
A world of unseen monsters roamed about, a world that seemed to be cut off from reality.
I must find the cat. My cat, pale and smelling of the moon.
In the midst of it all, I find stray cats that have escaped from the monsters.
I protect them and offer them a place to live.
Then I will fend off the enemy and exchange words with the mysterious inhabitants of the mansion.
This will surely lead me to the truth hidden in the mansion and the whereabouts of my cats.

About this game
This is a horror game about defeating monsters, protecting cats and making them happy.
In the mansion, you collect various materials to protect cats and advance the story.
At home, use the materials to make furniture to make the protected cat's living environment better.
Then, find the truth hidden in the depths of the mansion and your cat that ran away from home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel core i5-10300H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce2060RTX
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Processor: Intel core i5-10300H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce2060RTX
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Protect your cat, defeat the monsters, and build a happy home for your cat. Battles, crafting, exploration and conversations lead to the truth of the mansion and the whereabouts of your cat. A dark and heartwarming mansion-robbing horror adventure begins.
